Text:
Netherling is strong as wind,
and gentle as the kiss of
the morning dew.

Zundu remember your
kindness for many
summers to come.

Zundu feels a presence
behind like storm clouds
on the horizon.

Zundu hears voices, like
the whispers of the rain.

Zundu tires of being Vundu
footrest. Zundu just wants
to go home.

The beasts come,
roaring in like a tempest!

Vundu come, on angry
wings of thunder!
What is this? Am I saved?

My brother, you look as if
battered by raging winds.

Oh, what fortune! Like a ray
of sun breaking through the
clouds, you are!

My brother, your heart
seems as restless as
the stormy seas.

Were you perhaps chased
here by the cruel Vundu?

Worry not, for I shall guide you
home on a gentle breeze...

Come, and take shelter
under my wing...

Thank you, brother!
My heart shines like the sun!

Your breathing grows heavy,
brother. Let us rest here.

...Ahhh. The rest refreshes
me like a mountain spring.

Thank you, brother. Now let us
be off before the storms come.

Why rush? I see no
clouds on the horizon.

N-No! It was just the
rustling of the wind.

Finally! I thought spring might
come before you arrived!

Foolish Zundu. Time to
return and fulfill your fate
as a footstool.

You have escaped Vundu
clutches for the last time.

Proud, peaceful Zundu is
not a piece of furniture!

Netherling is a ray of light
in Zundu's darkest hour.

I must hurry back to
Ok' Zundu like the wind...

...and tell my brothers
of this Vundu treachery.

Oh, woe! Is there no
end to my dark days?

There are tracks
leading this direction!

Your orders are to
take no survivors!

You won't leave
this place alive!

Toss the bodies
over the edge.

The retreat is sounded!
Fall back! Fall back!

All for Tarasque!
All for Tarasque!

This one shall make
a fine offering!

Uplander must make
swiftheels with Slicktrix!

New vangob is complete!
Idyllshire is in danger!

Shkohhh... Slicktrix must
be telling shirefriends!

With a spear as stiff
as ice, I thrust!

Like the majestic
Coerthan puffer, I swell!

Like the surging waters
of the mighty Coerthas, I come!
Unauthorized temporal signature detected. Initiating elimination protocol.

This one shall make
an excellent offering.

My blood, my body,
my soul─as one!

Die, abomination!
The Fury wills it!

Here they come!
Protect the mint!

Zundu wants for water as
pure as the morning dew!

Zundu is as busy as a whirlwind!
Zundu wants for aid!

Like the clouds weep rain,
Zundu cries for water!

There must be more
around here somewhere...

What I wouldn't give
for a helping hand!
Hm. I could do with a few more.

That was too close!
Mayhap another time...
I knew the beast wasn't ready!
You'll be the envy of your friends!

The infernal contraptions are come!
Let us eradicate this threat to Thanalan!

Hearken to my words!
Glory in the song of rebirth!
We cannot allow these fiends to mar the celebrations!

This is an infestation...
Mayhap I should have brought more arrows!
We must stem this cold, metal tide!

They swarm in such numbers...
'Tis time for the stirring climax.
Do not let them...overrun the land...

Victory!
The bugs will not soon recover from this slaughter.

Thank you, adventurer.
The field is ours this day!

Their numbers are too great...
Let us fall back and regroup!
The faire is here at last!
Move aside! Let the lady pass!
You won't lay a finger on m'lady!
Let us grovel at your feet!
I just want to go to the faire...
Finally, I can enjoy the fireworks.
Please, at least pat my head.
Don't let her come to harm...
Why can Bugaal Ja not bathe at beach!?
You've been banned from the beach!
You jealous of bathing dance? I teach you!
Stop that! I've never seen such...undulations.
Smoothskins just jealous they cannot dance so!
Forbidden from hot springs, forbidden from beach...
But you cannot stop dance! Never!
Then dance out of my sight!
Heavens forfend anyone gets any ideas...
We'll be havin' our own faire!
You thought the Bombards were fierce!?
Thank you! Our guests should be safe now.
Don't let us see you near here again!
I will bathe, and I will dance!
Why...why do you despise me so...?
But I can't unsee his gyrations...
Now you see the power of my dance!
You are undeserving of my tradition!
If he returns, I may call on you again.
I can't pick these up alone.
Godsdamn, we'll have to try something else...
One sip'll perk you right up.
We can drink it right here.
Nothin' beats grog on the beach.
Come on, lass, I'll carry you.
Been itchin' for a little fun an' games!
Get your hands away from me!
Not the “fun” you had in mind, eh!?
Bend over and kiss your arse good-bye!
How do you like ribs? Broken!?
Gods be good, get the others!
We slaved away on those fireworks...
Intruders are too late! Too late!

Scamper all you will.
My lance will find you...
I shall pierce your very soul!
You defy the only rightful god!
You shall fall, as did your ally!
Our moment is come, Ser Janlenoux!

Now, Brothers!
Unleash the full power of the Heavens' Ward!

Lances at the ready...
Now fly!
No shield will defend you from the spear of my conviction!

<sound(1,51)>Have you tested your tactics with Lord of Verminion?
Assemble your loyal minions, and come to Minion Square!

<sound(1,51)>A Lord of Verminion tournament is about to begin.
Prospective entrants are encouraged to register at Minion Square!

<sound(1,51)>A Lord of Verminion tournament is currently underway!
Prospective challengers are invited to assemble in Minion Square!

<sound(1,51)>Lord of Verminion tournament registration will close momentarily.
Prospective challengers, please hasten to Minion Square!

<sound(1,51)>Another thrilling Lord of Verminion tournament has drawn to a close!
The winners will be announced in Minion Square.
We hope to see everyone back for the next competition!
By what unholy strength have we been bested...?
But there is no time for talk. The crabs come!
I am reminded of a tale from long ago...
...Of fledgling adventurers who would fight crabs like these to better themselves.
I pray our training is as successful as theirs was.
I believe that will suffice for now.
Fighting alongside such a seasoned warrior has been educational.
I am grateful that you chose to accompany me.
If only I had taken a proper meal beforehand...
'Tis as if the very air is tainted by darkness...
Minions of the Shadow Lord!? From whence did they come?
These demons... They call to mind another old story.
To surpass his limits, a great samurai once fought such fiends...
Perhaps by defeating these demons I can do the same.
It would seem we have driven them back.
Alas, I could scarcely match your pace. This will not do.
There must be a way for me to improve more quickly...
It would seem we have underestimated our enemy...
But I cannot fail─not with so much at stake...
Look! Over there! Could it be...?
I know that fiend. Those jagged pincers, dripping with venom...
It is Serket, an infamous beast and slayer of countless men.
Come! Let us bring an end to its legend and see ours grow in its wake!
To think that we managed to defeat such a foe...
And yet...I find that there is something within me still wanting.
\\<sigh> I must find a way to overcome this. I must find my way home.
To think...my strength would fail me at a time like this!
I will not be denied. I <Italic>1</Italic>will<Italic>0</Italic> find my way back home!
On your guard! I sense a dark presence...
There! And it is not alone...
But I am not alone either.
I will deal with the dragon. Pray attend to the eye.
I-I struck true, and yet...it is unharmed!?
I fear I am nearing my limit...
No! I did not come this far to fail now! I <Italic>1</Italic>will<Italic>0</Italic> return to my world!
At last, my training is complete. And it is all thanks to you.
You were always there to keep me on the path.
I would speak with you more, but not here. Let us make for Limsa Lominsa.
A million souls sing to me!
Will you help us retrieve our rice cakes?
Observe how the cyclops swings his mallet before making your approach!
He'll pulverize the entire mortar at this rate...

A fine display!
You've saved our mochi─and the festival!
It's Ser Aymeric! He's come to kill us!

Execute the hostages!
The Fury wills it!
See to the hostages! I will occupy the rebels!
Lay down your arms or die by the sword!
Tell them to come to me! Now go!

Me may mah mo,
me mo ma me～♪

Ziggy biggie pretties time!
Ziggy Ziggy hey!

Ziggy super beam time!
Ziggy Ziggy hey!
Uplanders will make fine subjects for bloodpoison!

Someday we'll find it,
the─\\<croak>─
connection～♪
Ceruleum tanks filled... Burn them all!
Victory is assured! Do not resist!
None can stand against Illuminati! Resign yourselves to defeat!
Analyzing intruder combat potential... Selecting optimal strategy!
Initializing automated ley lines... Commencing metaphysical combat sequence!
Aether levels critical... Emergency shutdown imminent...

Not shiny! Not pretty!
Do not want! Do not need!

Pretty tower! Our tower!
All for us! Not for you!

Stay with the General!
Ul'dah! Ul'dah!

Gah! I swore I'd
see this through!
O Halone, lead us to glory!
System synchronization complete... Auto-clean is on standby!
All weapons locked and loaded... Commencing combat mode!
Recalculating combat variables... Switching to optimal combat strategy...
